data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pešić, Vladimir, Zawal, Andrzej (2018): A new species in the water mite subgenus Majumderatax Vidrine, 1993 from Sri Lanka (Acari: Hydrachnidia). Zootaxa 4457 (2): 346-350, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4457.2.11|2 occurrences
